data.lyric:
[ti:Take Yourself Home]
[ar:Troye Sivan]
[al:Take Yourself Home]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Take Yourself Home - Troye Sivan (特洛耶·希文)
[00:03.38]Lyrics by：Oscar Görres/Tayla Parx/Brett McLaughlin/Troye Sivan Mellet
[00:06.77]Composed by：Oscar Görres/Tayla Parx/Brett McLaughlin/Troye Sivan Mellet
[00:10.16]I'm tired of the city
[00:11.52]Scream if you're with me
[00:12.80]If I'm gonna die let's die somewhere pretty
[00:15.68]
[00:20.26]Sad in the summer
[00:21.52]City needs a mother
[00:22.76]If I'm gonna waste my time then it's time to go
[00:26.10]
[00:26.90]Take yourself home
[00:28.84]
[00:30.39]Talk to me
[00:32.09]
[00:32.75]There's nothing that can't be fixed with some honesty
[00:37.54]And how it got this dark is just beyond to me
[00:42.55]If anyone can hear me switch the lights
[00:46.47]
[00:49.99]And happiness
[00:52.59]Is right there where you lost it
[00:54.53]When you took the bet
[00:57.12]
[00:57.64]Counting all the losses that you can't collect
[01:02.60]Got everything and nothing in my life
[01:05.95]
[01:10.06]I'm tired of the city
[01:11.45]Scream if you're with me
[01:12.75]If I'm gonna die let's die somewhere pretty
[01:16.42]
[01:20.21]Sad in the summer
[01:21.41]City needs a mother
[01:22.69]If I'm gonna waste my time then it's time to go
[01:25.92]
[01:26.75]Take yourself home
[01:28.38]
[01:29.48]Take yourself home
[01:30.63]
[01:49.63]Who you really tryna be when you see your face
[01:54.42]Is it worth it trying to win in a losing game
[01:59.13]Well it's all waiting for you
[02:01.34]And boy I know you're eager
[02:03.97]But it just might destroy you
[02:06.79]
[02:07.34]Destroy you
[02:10.04]I'm tired of the city
[02:11.42]Scream if you're with me
[02:12.73]If I'm gonna die let's die somewhere pretty
[02:16.16]
[02:20.16]Sad in the summer
[02:21.42]City needs a mother
[02:22.67]If I'm gonna waste my time then it's time to go
[02:26.19]
[02:26.95]Take yourself home
[02:28.31]
[02:29.18]Take yourself home
[02:30.41]
[02:49.63]Take yourself home
data.trans:
[ti:Take Yourself Home]
[ar:Troye Sivan]
[al:Take Yourself Home]
[by:v_emilylu]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.38]//
[00:06.77]//
[00:10.16]厌倦了城市的喧嚣
[00:11.52]若你亦是 就随我一起放声呐喊吧
[00:12.80]若是注定要陨落 便选择葬身于天堂吧
[00:20.26]夏日便伤怀
[00:21.52]城市也需要母亲的抚慰
[00:22.76]与其虚度光阴 不如启程前行
[00:26.90]让心找到它的归属
[00:30.39]不要沉默不语
[00:32.75]只要坦诚相待 一切问题便迎刃而解
[00:37.54]我真的不知 我们怎就走到了这种境地
[00:42.55]如果有人听到我的声音 请向我示意
[00:49.99]幸福
[00:52.59]一直在原地等着你
[00:54.53]你孤注一掷
[00:57.64]盘算着无法挽回的损失
[01:02.60]计较着人生的所得所失
[01:10.06]厌倦了城市的喧嚣
[01:11.45]若你亦是 就随我一起放声呐喊吧
[01:12.75]若是注定要陨落 便选择葬身于天堂吧
[01:20.21]夏日便伤怀
[01:21.41]城市也需要母亲的抚慰
[01:22.69]与其虚度光阴 不如启程前行
[01:26.75]让心找到它的归属
[01:29.48]让心找到它的归属
[01:49.63]对镜自视时 想想自己到底要成为怎样的人
[01:54.42]在注定失败的境遇中苦苦挣扎 这值得吗
[01:59.13]是的 一切皆有可能
[02:01.34]朋友 我知道你很渴望成功
[02:03.97]但这可能会让你一败涂地
[02:07.34]让你一败涂地
